name: Haven Grill & Sushi - Dushanbe
address: 63-98 Woodhaven Blvd, Middle Village, NY 11379, USA

reviews.text: pretty good
One complaint food too salty otherwise great place good vibes
HORRIBLE service!!! Waited literally 2 hrs for 4 sticks and it never came. No compensation, nothing. Just a bunch of sorrys‚Äô that no one ever needs
Wow absolutely delicious great vibe and all around great place have to come and try it

I recently celebrated my birthday at this restaurant and had such a wonderful experience! From start to finish, the service was outstanding and made the evening feel truly special. Eka and Dastar went above and beyond to make sure everything was perfect ‚Äî so attentive, friendly, and thoughtful. The atmosphere was warm, the food was delicious, and I couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better place to celebrate. Thank you for making my birthday unforgettable!
Customer care was the best, the food was delicious, highly recommend this place for every family occasion. special manager by name Eka Will give it to the best service
Great ambiance, good service and delicious food. My kids enjoyed every bite. Cant wait to come here at night with music and DJ. Highly recommend!!!!
Delicious food and amazing atmosphere. Thank you!!!
My family and I had an amazing dinner here at haven grill. The atmosphere is amazing! Service and food is top notch and it‚Äôs an amazing restaurant for all types of occasions!
Amazing food definitely recommend
Best shashlik in queens
I stopped here for a quick bite, and was happyly surprised of this very nice restaurant.  Great service!
Very good
Beautiful atmosphere and great food! Will definitely come again

Amazing food amazing service
Very nice place
Amazing environment
Amazing food and service !!! Will definitely be back !
Great food and great music.

Haven Grill on Woodhaven Blvd is an absolute gem! The food is always fresh, flavorful, and perfectly cooked. The service is just as great ‚Äì friendly, attentive, and welcoming every time I come in. You can really tell they care about their customers. Whether it‚Äôs for a quick bite or a sit-down meal, Haven Grill never disappoints. Highly recommend!

Food was not the best but for the price and being kosher it‚Äôs not bad. Some dishes I would not take again, like herring and potatoes. Should have known that it‚Äôs more of a shashlik place ( even though they serve sushi) but that‚Äôs on me. Plov was good as well as shashlik. Salads lacked flavor. I would go again if it‚Äôs a part of a larger crowd since there is lots of room.
Fun atmosphere the staff is amazing and the food is even better üëå
We had a wonderful experience here. The food was delicious and the establishment was sparkling clean. Our wait staff was friendly and attentive. We would definitely come back.
Food was amazing, great vibes
Good food and service!
Excellent food and great service

Great service. Live music. Fresh food.
I recommend the sweetbreads and veal leg soup
First time trying this new Kosher Uzbec (and sushi) restaurant in Rego Park. Delicious branzino and  lamb/beef pilaf. Will come back!
Amazing service best host and most importantly food is top tier. Really recommend even if you do not live nearby to come and eat super high quality Uzbek cuisine.
Well lit restaurant with delicious food and great service. Food was fresh and timing was perfect.

Greate place. Incredible service.
This is not my first time here and food been great and flavorful
Service is top notch
Great food and and nice go to spot with family or friends good vibes
This place was great good music good food!!! Go have swine fun check it out.
Very good food and great service
Great service and great atmosphere!
I just had the best experience at Haven grill restaurant. The service and food were absolutely phenomenal. I would definitely recommend this place and give this place 5 stars.
Food is great and ppl are nice . usually come here for lunch so far it‚Äôs been Real good.
Wow. What delicious food. I can‚Äôt stop coming to this place. No matter what you‚Äôre in the mood for they have it
The service is good, Glatt kosher ‚Äî everything was fresh and delicious. I highly recommend it to everyone looking for quality and authentic kosher cuisine.

Me and my partner wanted to eat some GLATT Kosher restaurant and decided on this new place call Haven Grill in Queens. I want to say WOW!! The music played by a DJ, the place was SOOO clean, the waiters are SOOO welcoming!
And the MOST IMPORTANT the food was AMAZING!!
The salads are super fresh and delicious , the SHISH KEBAB was so juicy and tasty! Everything fresh , the Lula Kebab (chicken AND beef ) were üëçüëçüëç. We had some dumplings , and some ‚Äúhouse specials‚Äù
We asked about  30 people birthday (they said they DO private events ) as my wife‚Äôs 40th birthday is coming.
Have ONLY good things to say and it was a PERFECT experience
I forgot to mention they have VALET PARKING!!! we were shocked

Ordered on Uber for delivery because I really wanted to try and wow. The texture on the rice was perfect in the crispy rice, tuna was on point and the sushi was just perfect and exactly what I wanted. Lola platter was so juicy and flavorful thank you for this perfect meal. Honestly soooo delicious.

WORST SERVICE AND FOOD IN THE WORLD!!!!!
The French fries were soggy and super burnt. Plus the meat was super salty with no seasoning flavor and the meat was nowhere near juicy and delicious.

We often visit friends in New York and every time we visit new places to have a snack breakfast or dinner. Last month we were here and came back again. We like the atmosphere, the food, the service. The manager Yfim   is an attentive and polite person with a smile.
This place is delicious. The sushi is very fresh. The soup and the meat is delicious. Reasonable prices and a good place to do an event or to go for a night out with family.

We had such an amazing experience at this Bukharian kosher restaurant! Every single dish that came out was absolutely delicious and truly authentic, you can tell the food is made with love and tradition. We loved everything we tried! The music added such a lively and fun touch to the evening, and the overall vibe felt just like being with family. The atmosphere was so warm and friendly. The owners were incredibly welcoming, and a special thank you to Nessa, who was so kind and attentive. Highly recommend this place if you‚Äôre looking for great food and a great time!

We were in this restaurant today, we were very pleased!
The food was delicious.
The service was excellent: the waiters were polite and attentive.
The atmosphere is cozy, clean and pleasant to be in.
We will definitely come back again. Thank you.

Absolutely blown away! This place is incredible. The fried dumplings and the fried eggplant salad were hands-down my favorites, but honestly, everything we tried was delicious. Huge thanks to Inessa for making us feel so welcome and at home. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back!
The food is fresh and tasty. The French fries were memorable. The baklava with pistachio is divine. The dessert raisins and nuts yummy. The service was excellent. We loved it.

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
We just left the restaurant and everything was absolutely amazing! The food was incredibly fresh and flavorful, the service was attentive and professional, and the ambiance was warm and inviting. You can tell a lot of love and care went into every detail. This is definitely going to be our new go-to spot. Highly recommend!

Customer service is incredible everyone here is so attentive and helpful. I really loved the decor . Food was amazing I love the portion how clean the place is keep up the good work. I will definitely be coming back and be recommending my family.

Heaven Grill combines flavor and professionalism. The place is immaculate, and the staff keeps everything running like clockwork. The chef clearly has high standards ‚Äî both in food and cleanliness. We felt really taken care of from start to finish.

We had a party of 20 girls at Heaven Grill Restaurant, and I can honestly say it was one of the best group dining experiences we‚Äôve ever had. From the moment we pulled up, the valet service made arrival smooth and stress-free, and the staff was ready to welcome us with open arms. The atmosphere was beautiful ‚Äî warm, clean, and stylish ‚Äî and the music created the perfect background vibe without being too loud. The servers were so accommodating, helping us with seating, menu selections, and even customizing a few orders. They made us feel genuinely cared for, which is rare with a group this size.

The food was absolutely phenomenal ‚Äî truly authentic Bukharian cuisine made with love. The kebabs, plov, and samsa were cooked to perfection, and every dish came out hot, fresh, and beautifully presented. And let me tell you ‚Äî the sushi was a surprise hit! So fresh and flavorful, you‚Äôd never expect this quality from a Bukharian grill, and all of it was Glatt Kosher, which was important to our group. The chef even came out to greet us, which added a thoughtful, personal touch. The entire place was spotless, and everything ran so smoothly. It‚Äôs not easy to handle a party of 20, but Heaven Grill made it feel effortless. We‚Äôll definitely be coming back ‚Äî highly recommended for events and special occasions!

This venue is relatively new, but it feels like it was open for ages. Salats, appetizers , soups everything was very preventable and delicious. Shish kebabs were very tender and delicious,  variety of meats was tremendous. Definitely we will make this place our Family restaurant üòä

Got charged for lemons only wanted to use it for my drink. For 2 people got charged a 18% gratuity fee. The appetizer fried dumpling was good but the entree was bland and not recommended. I asked for chicken kebab and .50 chimichurri sauce the waitress never informed me that they didn't have it and gave tzaiki sauce only after I got her attention, otherwise I wouldn't get any sauce. She just served the food after waiting for awhile and we are the only other table in there.They're under construction and was very noisy, only then after we completed our meal they put their music on. Someone was playing their cellphone loudly the atmosphere and ambience wasn't there. We aren't coming back we paid, left and you couldn't pay us to return. 1 star well earned

I can recommend this place. Food is tasty, prices decent, atmosphere great we thought. 1 star deducted for lamb ribs that were so salty we couldnt really eat them, and a common practice where they advertise hanger steak on the menu but bring regular beef [tender and tastes good but not skirt or hanger strak]....I recommend you try it....the liver shish was AMAZING!

We hosted a family dinner at Heaven Grill and loved everything about it. The food is 100% Glatt Kosher and authentically Bukharian ‚Äî a rare combo done right. Everything from the juicy kebabs to the flavorful plov was top-notch. Clean, comfortable, and respectful service.

Found this gem on Google because I wanted a quick sushi bite and I honestly left so confused. It is a Jewish restaurant which I think they were a little racisMe and my friend walked in without a reservation and a gentleman came and said this side is for reservations. He then proceeded to walk us outside and put us in a room like looked like storage or part of a coffee shop. We immediately asked him if we would be able to go to the main dining area because it looked empty and we were only two people. He said ‚Äúdo you guys really want to go ?‚Äù We said if you can yes because the area we were brought to felt like they were just putting us aside and hidding us from the rest of the crowd. He then said he was going to get in ‚Äútrouble‚Äù for it. We were honestly so confused by the vibes it was almost as if they didn‚Äôt want people of color there. We felt rushed out and judged. We even tried making a reservation on the website and it let us at 7pm which means that they had space but didn‚Äôt want to seat us. Which was such ashamed because we enjoyed the food especially the sushi.

Haven grill really surprised us, not only is the Bukharian food incredible but the sushi was just as impressive! We ordered a few rolls for the table and they were fresh, beautifully presented and packed with flavor. This place is also Glatt kosher and absolutely delicious!!

Loved everything about this place. Definitely exceeded my expectations.Their overall food was delicious. I would definitely consider going there again, And to top it off their service was exceptional.  ‚ù§Ô∏è

Absolute must try!!

I recently had the pleasure of dining at Haven Cafe, and I can confidently say it‚Äôs a gem! From the moment I walked in, I was captivated by the beautiful ambiance‚Äîelegant decor and cozy lighting create a welcoming atmosphere.
Now, let‚Äôs talk about the food: every dish was absolutely delicious! The flavors were vibrant and perfectly balanced. I highly recommend trying the mushroom ravioli as it was a standout for me.
Also, the French onion soup üî•üî•üî•
What truly impressed me was the affordability. It‚Äôs rare to find such high-quality meals at reasonable prices
Overall, this cafe is a must-visit for anyone looking to enjoy a fantastic meal without breaking the bank. I can‚Äôt wait to go back!

Great food and atmosphere the place is very pleasant. I highly recommend to try their food. Everything is fresh and cooked with so much flavor and taste. We even got dessert on the house. They serve all types of dishes, sushi, lamb chops pastas every dish has a unique taste.
Heaven Grill is where it‚Äôs at. Super chill place, really friendly staff. Their beef ribs and charcoal chicken had that authentic, rustic flavor l‚Äôve been searching for . Respect!!
Great friendly service! , food was amazing definitely recommend!

My wife‚Äôs been raving about this place since the day it opened and we finally decided to go tonight to check out what the fuss was all about. The food, atmosphere, and services was on point!! Large variety of different sushi, pastas and meat's. Our waiter was very attentive, courteous and met our every want.  You guys will not be disappointed. Everything is fresh and delicious. 5 stars
